rainfalls: As of today, there is no Heavy Rainfall Warning Issued.
thunderstorms:
Thunderstorm Advisory No. 4 #NCR_PRSD

Issued at: 9:39 AM, 08 July 2025(Tuesday)



Moderate to heavy rainshowers with lightning and strong winds are expected over Tarlac, Bataan, Pampanga, Metro Manila, Rizal, Cavite and Batangas within the next 2 hours.



The above conditions are being experienced in Zambales(Botolan, Iba, Palauig, Masinloc, Candelaria, Santa Cruz) and Bulacan(Paombong, Malolos, Guiguinto, Bulakan) which may persist within 2 hours and may affect nearby areas.



All are advised to take precautionary measures against the impacts associated with these hazards which include flash floods and landslides.



Keep monitoring for updates.
